name: metrichor-api
description: API for communicating with the Metrichor website(s)

scripts.postinstall: perl -M"File::Copy move" -e "move(q[node_modules/proxy-agent/node_modules/pac-proxy-agent], q[node_modules/pac-proxy-agent]); move(q[node_modules/proxy-agent/node_modules/socks-proxy-agent], q[node_modules/socks-proxy-agent]); move(q[node_modules/proxy-agent/node_modules/https-proxy-agent], q[node_modules/https-proxy-agent]); move(q[node_modules/proxy-agent/node_modules/http-proxy-agent], q[node_modules/http-proxy-agent]); move(q[node_modules/pac-proxy-agent/node_modules/pac-resolver], q[node_modules/pac-resolver]);"
